name: P34_30s
prompt: suburban home front porch, viewed from an elevated vantage point near the front door, looking outward at midday. Bright natural daylight with clear sky, well-lit scene with defined shadows. A known resident accompanied by an unfamiliar guest. They walk together to the door, resident unlocks and both enter. Static downward-angled viewpoint, wide-angle with slight barrel distortion, fisheye edge distortion, Clear high-quality footage with sharp details. Real-time speed, natural fluid human motion at 1x playback rate.
negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, artifacts, glitches, distorted, unrealistic motion, multiple camera angles, jump cuts, visible camera, security camera device, doorbell camera, camera lens visible, camera equipment, camera housing, surveillance camera in frame, camera mount, camera on wall, camera on ceiling, camera rig, recording device in shot, gopro, webcam, CCTV camera visible, Ring doorbell visible, Nest camera visible, slow motion, time lapse, fast forward, sped up, slowed down
